comments: Vinyl is immaculate.  Ultrasonically cleaned (Audio Desk Systeme). Plays perfectly. Labels clean - just a couple of faint spindle trails. Artwork sleeve has just very light rubbing at seams - very clean overall. Obi clean at front with just one tiny tear/dent at the top - light creasing/small tear on reverse. Booklet clean. Lovely copy of this Japanese jazz masterpiece! *ZY*

seller.shipping:
Shipping costs as follows

ALL ORDERS OVER £30 MUST BE SHIPPED AS REGISTERED POST

This means

UK - SIGNED FOR £1.00 extra

OUTSIDE UK - TRACKED/SIGNED £5.00 extra

United Kingdom

LP/12"/10"

I can now send up to 7 records for £4.00 via standard Second Class Post. This service is a 48 hour service. Worth it if you want to save a bit of money on the post. Second Class Signed For is £5.00 for up to 7 records.

If you require First Class, 1-3 LP/12"/10" records = £4.75 / 4-7 records = £6.50. Please add £1 for Signed For postage (£5.75/£7.50 respectively).

I can ship between 10 and 100 records for only £12.00 using UPS 48 hour service.

ALL ORDERS OVER £30 MUST BE SHIPPED AS REGISTERED POST

European Buyers: Orders will be shipped Standard Airmail unless requested with the exception of Italy. 
ALL ORDERS MUST BE SENT VIA REGISTERED AIRMAIL TO ITALY . This is due to a disproportionate amount of packages going missing due to Poste Italiane's unreliable service. I will, however, make exceptions if you are a regular customer.
